Govt briefing the media about how Monday's going to be some kind of Virus-Day liberation is staggeringly reckless. 
We're no nearer beating COVID-19 now than we were pre-lockdown: no vaccine, no treatment, no 100% antibody test, no proof of immunity.
This is 1918 all over again.
